verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:10
verses.text: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes? For our sakes, no doubt, this is written: that he that ploweth should plow in hope; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:11
verses.text: If we have sown unto you spiritual things, is it a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:12
verses.text: If others be partakers of this power over you, are not we rather? Nevertheless we have not used this power; but suffer all things, lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ.
